newsitem.title: USA: Family Bargain April same-store sales off.
newsitem.headline: Family Bargain April same-store sales off.

text.p: Family Bargain Corp said sales for the four-week period ended May 4 rose 12.4 percent to $19.0 million from $16.9 million last year.
Comparable-store sales for April decreased 2.7 percent.
Sales for the 13 weeks ended May 4 were $60.4 million, up 16.7 percent from $51.7 million for the first 13 weeks of fiscal 1996. Same-store sales rose 1.3 percent for 13-week period ended May 4.
The company operated 157 stores as of May 4.
